title: [K-12] Technological Disruption and Business Model Transformation Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Knowledge in Business Administration or Technological Innovation
context.additional_context: A project-based course analyzing technological changes in the digital transformation era and strengthening organizational learning capabilities

learning_goals: Learners can explain the necessity of business model transitions by analyzing technological disruption cases.
Students can propose practical strategies by applying principles of designing organizational learning systems.
Learners can develop a flexible organizational structure model and establish an action plan to respond to technological changes.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
